Private Events
Let Us Bring Your Next Event to Life
Our private venues at Eagleâs Nest are perfect for any occasion. Whether youâre planning a birthday party, corporate event, bridal shower, or anything else youâre envisioning our versatile spaces provide the ideal setting for your special event.
Private Party Room:
Versatile Event Space
Our private party room can be tailored to suit a variety of events. With customizable layouts and dedicated service, we ensure your event is both memorable and seamless.
The Pavilion:
Our Incredible Outdoor Venue
Need additional space or prefer to host your event outside? Our pavilion is the perfect spot. Additional tables and tents can be added outside to make sure every guest has a perfect seat!
Bar & Catering Options
Enhance your event with our open bar and catering menu options. Our experienced bartenders and chefs are ready to provide a delightful culinary experience to wow your guests! Choose from a wide selection of drinks and dishes to create the perfect menu for your guests.
Venue Booking Form
Would you like to book space to host an event at Eagle's Nest? Please complete the below form so our team can help bring it to life!

Blackwater's Hidden Gem:
Where Fun and Flavor Take Flight
Welcome To Eagle's Nest in Crestview, FL
We are a Veteran-owned restaurant open to the public on the stunning Blackwater Golf Course. Come as you are and indulge in delicious food you won't find anywhere else! From an incredible pizza to beautifully crafted cocktails, we have something to delight every palate.
â
Need some fresh air? Our unique outdoor pavilion bordered by lush trees is the perfect spot for a night (or day!) out. Join us for events like live bands, karaoke, trivia nights, and themed parties. There's fire pits (we have the s'mores kits ready!), cornhole, and bouncy houses to ensure a fun time for all ages.
